data.name: Mash Me Up
data.description:
Do you want to play party games with your friends or meet someone new? All is just one button press away with Mash Me Up.

One button, multiple games. Will it be Air Hockey, Pier Pong, Flingball, orâ€¦ Get ready for a surprise! Press, Play, Enjoy and Go Again!

Join our discord: https://discord.gg/zQKKUseNt3

changelog.change_log:
- 2 new games: Tower conquer and Color tricks. Use voice commands to play these games.
- Other small bug fixes and improvements.

- 2 new games: Blackjack and Lucky wheel. Use voice commands to play these games, and play with up to 4 friends!
- Other small bug fixes and improvements.

- New game: Snowball fight!
- Other small bug fixes and improvements.

- New game: Super Fast!
- Option to block players after a game to avoid being matched with them in future games.
- Fixed the error message when server is unreachable (previously saying please update).
- Notification system
- Due to some changes in the backend, some users might have lost some of the friends added in game... Please contact us if this happened to you.
- Other small bug fixes and improvements.

- New game: Super Fast!
- Option to block players after a game to avoid being matched with them in future games.
- Fixed the error message when server is unreachable (previously saying please update).
- Notification system
- Due to some changes in the backend, some users might have lost some of the friends added in game... Please contact us if this happened to you.
- Other small bug fixes and improvements.

New environment: 80s basements. Go back in the past to this 80s gamer basement to play Foosball.
Improved text readability with font change. 
Guess Yourself: Post-it missing bug fixed.
Other bug fixes and improvements.

New party game: Foosball!
New game selection mechanics: Button down means game is selected (blue), while button up means game is not selected (grey). 
Other small bug fixes and improvements

Play with friends!! 
Add new friends
Game selection possible when playing with friends
Voice chat improvements
Other minor bug fixes and improvements

Bug fixes and improvements
Force restart after first login to prevent voice not working
reducing some noise and improving performance
